title: [caffe2] Questions about conv_transpose && ConvTranspose
body_html:
I need to use conv_transpose(), but I always receive the same error. My code are as follows, any help would be highly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

upconv = brew.conv_transpose(
model,
blob_in = final_avg,
blob_out = 'upconv',
dim_in = =512,
dim_out = 2048,
kernels = [4,1,1],
strides = [2,1,1],
pads = [1,0,0],
)

body:
I need to use conv_transpose(), but I always receive the same error. My code are as follows, any help would be highly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

upconv = brew.conv_transpose(
    model,
    blob_in = final_avg,
    blob_out = 'upconv',
    dim_in = =512,
    dim_out = 2048,
    kernels = [4,1,1],
    strides = [2,1,1],
    pads = [1,0,0],
)
